about_the_game:
DLC 1: A Strange Fate includes new Scenario, Character, Subquests, and Building Types content for That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime ISEKAI Chronicles!

Delve into Additional Scenario: A Strange Fate.

Additional Character Hinata joins in Rimuru’s story.

Further adventures with Rimuru with Additional Subquests: Robot Action Figure, Legendary Sword, The Safe, Zegion's Gift, Whiskey, City of Nature, Trading Card Game 3, Idol Concert, Motor Car, Clock Tower.

Grow Tempest with Additional Building Types: 3-Star Luxury Restaurant, Super Rimuloo, Dryad Flower Shop, Chateau Rimuru, Swords of Tempest, Tempest Museum, Tempest Herbs.

*DLC 1 may be included in other editions or bundles. Please be mindful of duplicate purchases.
*Main game must be cleared before DLC can be accessed.
*Contents and specifications are subject to change at any time.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Fantasy Violence, Suggestive Themes and Mild Language with swear words like “Hell”, “Bastard”, “Damn”, “Piss”.
